title: BRIEF-Rave Restaurant Group Reports Second Fiscal Quarter 2018 Financial Results
text:
February 6, 2018 / 1:58 PM / Updated 3 minutes ago BRIEF-Rave Restaurant Group Reports Second Fiscal Quarter 2018 Financial Results Reuters Staff 
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Rave Restaurant Group Inc: 
* RAVE RESTAURANT GROUP, INC. REPORTS SECOND FISCAL QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q2 REVENUE FELL 38.1 PERCENT TO $4.2 MILLION * Q2 LOSS PER SHARE $0.04 
* ‍DURING FISCAL QUARTER ENDED DECEMBER 24, 2017, COMPANY DISCONTINUED ITS NORCO DISTRIBUTION DIVISION​ 
* RAVE RESTAURANT GROUP - ‍SALE OF FOOD, EQUIPMENT, SUPPLIES NO LONGER RECOGNIZED AS REVENUE, COST OF SUCH ITEMS IS NO LONGER INCLUDED IN COST OF SALES​ 
* ‍DURING Q2, NUMBER OF PIZZA INN DOMESTIC UNITS DECLINED TO 156, WHILE INTERNATIONAL UNITS INCREASED TO 62​ 
* QTRLY PIZZA INN DOMESTIC COMPARABLE STORE RETAIL SALES INCREASED 2.7PCT FROM SAME PERIOD OF PRIOR YEAR 
* QTRLY PIE FIVE COMP STORE RETAIL SALES DECREASED 13.7PCT, WHILE TOTAL SYSTEM-WIDE RETAIL SALES DECREASED BY 18.8PCT​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
